array.string: Vehicle or SR-22 filing information not submitted to DMV.
Producer inquiry to confirm if risk is acceptable prior to or after processing an edorsement.
Documentation needed to identify detailed policy information for the DMV or pending court date.
Questions regarding the company guidlines or UW processes.
Producer is suspended due to NSF payment received. Notification will be faxed and emailed advising of status prior to suspension.
DMV Reporting/SR-22 Filings
Unacceptable Risk
LOE Request
General UW Questions
Producer NSF
Producer forwards a request to terminate new business application on the same day.
Producer forwards an insured's request to terminate a policy mid term.
Payment was applied to a policy in error by the producer.
A producer's request is received to change policy information. No additional payment is needed to complete endorsement.
An online endorsement was processed and the producer forwards a request to void. This should be received by UW on the same day as processed.
Inquiring about the difference in policy premium for a new business or renewal term.
Credit or payment request received to be returned to producer or finance company.
Void Requests
Insured Cancellation Requests
Misapplied Payment Corrections
Endorsement Requests
Void Endorsement Requests
Premium Difference
Manual Check Requests
Additional payment request received to be returned to producer or finance company.
Premium Generating
Buy/sell has been completed and policies are to be transferred to the new producer code.
Broker of Record Change
Finance company has submitted a request to cancel a policy. A wait period is enforced to allow for potential reinstatements.
Premium Finance Cancellation Requests
